entry.title: phw/peek
entry.summary: Simple animated GIF screen recorder with an easy to use interface

entry.title: teejee2008/timeshift
entry.summary: System restore tool for Linux. Creates filesystem snapshots using rsync+hardlinks, or BTRFS snapshots. Supports scheduled snapshots, multiple backup levels, and exclude filters. Snapshots can be restored while system is running or from Live CD/USB.

entry.title: cheesecakeufo/komorebi
entry.summary: A beautiful and customizable wallpapers manager for Linux
